CreateUserByAdminDto.description: DTO for creating a new user by admin

UpdateUserByAdminDto.description: DTO for updating user by admin

AdminResetPasswordDto.description: DTO for admin resetting user password (different from user self-reset password flow)

BulkPermissionUpdateDto.description: DTO for bulk user permission update

BulkPermissionRemoveDto.description: DTO for bulk user permission removal

CreateCustomerDto.description: DTO for creating a new customer

DashboardSummaryDto.description: Comprehensive dashboard summary with all important metrics in one response

UserProductCreationDto.description: DTO for user product creation tracking

InvoiceWithPaymentsResponseDto.description: Enhanced DTO for invoice response with multiple payment methods

PaymentMethodDto.description: DTO for individual payment method in an invoice

CreateInvoiceWithMultiplePaymentsDto.description: Enhanced DTO for creating invoice with multiple payment methods

CreateInvoiceByItemCodeDto.description: DTO for creating invoice by item code

UserFriendlyCreateProductDto.description:
User-friendly DTO for creating products with text-based master data
Users can simply enter text values like "Gold", "Pune", "Counter1" instead of knowing IDs

BulkCreateProductsDto.description: DTO for bulk product creation with user-friendly inputs

ProductExcelUploadResponseDto.description: DTO for Product Excel upload response

CreateQuotationItemDto.description: DTO for creating a quotation item

SendQuotationEmailDto.description: DTO for sending quotation via email

BulkStockMovementDto.description: DTO for bulk stock movement creation

RfidUsageByCategoryDto.description: DTO for RFID usage summary by category

RfidUsageByBranchDto.description: DTO for RFID usage summary by branch

RfidUsageByCounterDto.description: DTO for RFID usage summary by counter

UsedRfidAnalysisDto.description: DTO for used RFID tag analysis - includes count and detailed RFID information

totalUsedCount.description: Total count of used RFID tags

usedRfids.description: List of used RFID tags with their details

UsedRfidDetailDto.description: DTO for individual used RFID tag details

epcValue.description: EPC value of the RFID tag

productId.description: Product ID this RFID is assigned to

assignedOn.description: When the RFID was assigned to the product

UnusedRfidAnalysisDto.description: DTO for unused RFID tag analysis - includes count and detailed RFID information

totalUnusedCount.description: Total count of unused RFID tags

unusedRfids.description: List of unused RFID tags with their details

UnusedRfidDetailDto.description: DTO for individual unused RFID tag details

epcValue.description: EPC value of the RFID tag

RfidScanResponseDto.description: DTO for RFID scan response - returns all products associated with scanned EPC values

scanResults.description: List of scanned products grouped by EPC value

unmatchedEpcValues.description: EPC values that were scanned but found no products

EpcScanResultDto.description: DTO for individual EPC scan result

epcValue.description: The EPC value that was scanned

rfidCode.description: RFID code associated with this EPC value

productCount.description: Number of products found for this EPC value

products.description: List of products associated with this EPC value

ScannedProductDto.description: DTO for individual product found during RFID scan

rfidCode.description: RFID code assigned to this product

epcValue.description: EPC value of the RFID tag

assignedOn.description: When the RFID was assigned to this product

branchName.description: Branch name where product is located

counterName.description: Counter name where product is located

RfidScanRequestDto.description: DTO for RFID scan request - user provides EPC value to scan

epcValue.description: Single EPC value to scan for (for backward compatibility)

epcValues.description: Multiple EPC values to scan for (new feature)

RfidExcelUploadResponseDto.description: DTO for RFID Excel upload response

newRfidsCreated.description: Number of new RFID codes created

existingRfidsUpdated.description: Number of existing RFID codes updated

errors.description: List of errors encountered during processing

RfidExcelRowDto.description: DTO for individual RFID data from Excel

ProductInfo.description: DTO for product information in transfer

CreateStockTransferDto.description: DTO for creating a new stock transfer

CreateStockVerificationDto.description: DTO for creating a new stock verification session

SubmitStockVerificationDto.description: DTO for submitting scanned items for verification

StockVerificationReportResponseDto.description: DTO for stock verification report response

DateWiseStockVerificationReportDto.description: DTO for date-wise stock verification report

UserDto.description: User data transfer object for API responses

city.description: City where the user is located

connectionString.description: Connection string for the client database

isAdmin.description: Whether the user is an admin

adminUserId.description: ID of the admin user who created this user (null for main admin)

CreateUserDto.description: Data transfer object for creating a new user

city.description: City where the user is located

LoginResponseDto.description: Data transfer object for login response

UserAccessInfoDto.description: Data transfer object for user access information

LoginDto.description: Data transfer object for user login

UpdateUserDto.description: Data transfer object for updating user information

city.description: City where the user is located

ForgotPasswordResponseDto.description: Data transfer object for forgot password response

resetToken.description: Password reset token (for testing purposes - remove in production)

ForgotPasswordDto.description: Data transfer object for forgot password request

ResetPasswordResponseDto.description: Data transfer object for reset password response

success.description: Whether the password reset was successful

ResetPasswordDto.description: Data transfer object for reset password request

token.description: Password reset token received from forgot password email (required)

confirmPassword.description: Confirm new password (required, must match NewPassword)

PermissionCheckResult.description: Data transfer object for permission check result

UserPermissionDetailsDto.description: Data transfer object for comprehensive user permission details

UserProfileResponseDto.description: Data transfer object for user profile response

UpdateUserProfileDto.description: Data transfer object for updating user profile

CompleteUserProfileDto.description: Data transfer object for complete user profile (including user data)

CreateWebhookSubscriptionDto.description: DTO for creating a webhook subscription

Bearer.description: JWT Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: "Authorization: Bearer {token}"
Bearer.name: Authorization
